short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to watch videos and read comments at the same time on Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension to watch and read comments at the same time on Youtube.

Features a draggable divider to resize the player and the sidebar.

The Playlist is shown in the sidebar by clicking the sidebar tab button 'playlist'.

Source code available: https://github.com/tberghuis/watch-and-read-comments-for-youtube
